Posts.Content: Oct 29, 2013 06:29AM Dbay wrote: Hi, same thing here 43 total hysterectomy in 2006, no HRT ( I do have two kids). No first line Bc. I DID get a second opinion, for a lump that did not show up on mammo, but did on ultasound. It will ease your mind just knowing. I think you have to be your own advocate!
Posts.Title: Should I request a second opinion? Michaela1310 Michaela1310
